name: The Bank Heist LT
description:
Slip into the role of the new town marshall. At the every month payment day all the citizens comes to the bank to deposit his money. In the same hour the bandits starts a bank heist.

You have to shoot down all the bandits but not the people who deposit his money. Look for all 12 doors and get money deposited behing every door to complete the level.

Features:
-Cute Graphics
-Easy to learn gameplay
-Very addictive
-Great for your kids too
-One App for all iPhone, iPod and iPad Devices

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
